content: See http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2815 for a summary of the outcome of discussions about this in Cologne

And now I've written this into the specification. See http://build.fhir.org/http.html#version-parameter for the substantive change part, http://build.fhir.org/versioning.html for the documentation, and there are references to this stuff from about 10 different places in the spec (including from the front page)
please review (@Corey Spears @Paul Knapp @Lenel James @Claude Nanjo I believe you all voted on this - we'll be asking your withdraw based on this)
@Grahame Grieve The version specific profile address my ballot comment and therefore I withdraw. The addition of the payload version to the html is useful for exchanges using FHIR html.
